title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 604.14 - Disabled vehicles
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 604.14 - Disabled vehicles

State Regulations

Disabled vehicles may be removed from the vehicular crossing
by the authority. The reasonable cost of such removal may be assessed by the
authority against the owner or operator thereof. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
604.14

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
